text: After a year in which the share price of the main beneficiary of the artificial intelligence (AI) race more than tripled, plenty of investors will fear they have missed the boat with semiconductor designer Nvidia (US:NVDA). But when it comes to equities, what goes up doesn’t always come down. Especially when the company in question is enabling a technology that could disrupt the world in the way steam power, electricity and the internet did before it.
